profile:
Martella Tiling Services is owned and operated out of Wasaga Beach, Ontario and serves the entire Georgian Bay region.

We provide quality and professional tile installation services for both residential and commercial buildings.

The owner of Martella Tiling Services, Salvatore Della Bruna, is a professional tile setter with numerous years of experience. He puts his heart and soul into every installation he does â€“ you will not be disappointed with his work! He strives to ensure each and every customer is satisfied with the service he provides.
services:
Tile in showers and bathtubs.
Flooring in any area of a home (kitchen, bathroom, entryway, laundry room, etc).
Tile or stone on fireplaces.
Kitchen backsplashes.
Accent walls.
